EmailTemplate.name: VMT-Shirt Deploy.VMT-Shirt Instructions to Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Limited Edition VMT-Shirt 2-Step Instructions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> {{Lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}},
Congratulations! You are on your way to claiming one of the greatest t-shirts since the tuxedo t-shirt. In order to receive your Limited Edition VMTee, follow these instructions:
- Request a License Key <http://go.vmturbo.com/new-cloud-edition-license.html/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmt-shirt&utm_content=instructions> for your instance of VMTurbo Operations Manager - Deploy the solution in your own environment and send a screenshot, along with your shirt size and mailing address to swag@vmturbo.com <mailto:swag@vmturbo.com&subject=VMT-Shirt Request> - Your shirt is on its way. - Rock on. 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
Copyright © 2014 VMTurbo, Inc. All rights reserved. <http://www.facebook.com/vmturbo1> <http://www.twitter.com/VMTurbo> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/248491>
